summary: Newly remarried woman finds her businessman husband boring and runs into her wealthy playboy first husband.
cast: Tyrone Power|Loretta Young|Stuart Erwin|Claire Trevor|Marjorie Weaver|Lyle Talbot|J. Edward Bromberg|Paul Hurst|Jayne Regan|Hal K. Dawson|Mary Treen|Brooks Benedict|Stanley Blystone|Wade Boteler|Troy Brown Sr.|Harry Burkhardt|Lon Chaney Jr.|James Conaty|Wally Dean|Jay Eaton|Sarah Edwards|Marion Feducha|Herbert Fortier|Philippa Hilber|Arthur Stuart Hull|Robert Kellard|Fred Kelsey|Joe King|Robert Lowery|Major McBride|Paul McVey|Harold Miller|Bert Moorhouse|Alex Novinsky|Thomas Pogue|Alexander Pollard|Lillian Porter|Arthur Rankin|Henry Roquemore|Phillips Smalley|Charles Tannen|William Wagner
title: Second Honeymoon
